backend/main.mo: Actor exposes a single getChatbotReply method that always traps with a safety violation message.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking UI and safety requirements to specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptive summaries for key frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and a custom OKLCH color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that mounts the React app and loads the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing chat state, backend calls, message list rendering, safety dialogs, and clear-chat function.
frontend/src/components/ChatComposer.tsx: Message input component with textarea, send button, and Enter/Shift+Enter behavior.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Renders individual chat messages with user/assistant avatars and styling.
frontend/src/components/DeveloperSafetyN: Collapsible warning explaining API key exposure risks and best security practices.
frontend/src/components/SafetyUsage.tsx: Safety and usage guidelines dialog describing content policies and acceptable behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend canister actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient setup, login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for sending a message to the backend via actor.getChatbotReply and invalidates the messages query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and extensive OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility additions like text-balance.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors from CSS variables, adding fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, safety constraints, existing features, and required assets, including notes about prohibited explicit content and compromised API keys.
